thread.title: SA mining contractor cuts 125 jobs

title: SA mining contractor cuts 125 jobs
text:
Wed, Jul 22, 2015, 3:24 PM AEST - Australia Markets close in 36 mins. SA mining contractor cuts 125 jobs AAP – 51 minutes ago 
More South Australian workers will lose their jobs after a mining contractor announced it would shed more than 100 positions. 
BGC Contracting will cut 125 jobs from two projects near Port Augusta in October. 
"As a result of the current market environment and reduced mining volumes, BGC Contracting has made changes to mine plans at its operations at Iron Knob and South Middleback Ranges in South Australia," the company said in a statement. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Low inflation gives RBA rate options AAP
